channel.title: +indices on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +indices on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: V2
item.description:
INDEX TO PARTS I AND II.

p. 456 p. 457

INDEX TO PARTS I AND II.

(KĀṆḌAS I-IV.)

ā, Part I, page 101

abhighāraṇa, I, 192.

abhiplava-shaḍaha, II, 403.

abhīvarta-sāman, II, 434.

abortion, causing of, II, 11.

adābhya-graha, II, 424.

ādāra plant, a substitute for Soma-plants, II, 422.

ādhītayajus, II, 20, 22, 23.

adhrigu litany, II, 188.

adhvara, I, 114.

Adhvaryu, I, introd. xx seq., xxvi; must not pass between dhishṇyas, II, 153; passes north of Āgnīdhra shed, ib.; his response (pratigara), 231, 326, 328, 330, 331; he is the head of the sacrifice, 276; goes in front, 440.

item.title: V5
item.description:
INDEX TO PARTS III, IV, AND V.

p. 511

INDEX TO PARTS III, IV, AND V.

(KĀṆḌAS V—XIV.)

abhijit, Soma-day, Part IV, page 321 n.

abhiplava-shaḍaha, III, introd. xxi; V, 148; is the established (regular) shaḍaha, 249; used by Ādityas when contending with Aṅgiras, 152; etymology, 252, 162.

abhisheka, III, 68; the ‘Vasor dhārā’ and Vājaprasavīya oblations performed on completed fire-altar are a consecration-ceremony superior to the ordinary one, IV, 213 seq.; and including the consecration of both Rājasūya and Vājapeya, 225.
